attributes.action: Enforce A Minimum Recycling Symbol Size Of 20mm
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to introduce legislation to make it compulsory for the plastic packaging of all products sold in the UK to have standard recycling symbols of a minimum size. If we are to encourage people to recycle their plastics then I suggest that 20mm (3/4 inch) across is the absolute minimum size that people, especially older citizens, should be expected to try and decipher.
